plot: We all have certain images for films in our heads. But they also need to go together in some kind of a story. Or do they? Three friends let their imagination run free. With interesting results.
title: Brainstorming
plot_es: We all have certain images for films in our heads. But they also need to go together in some kind of a story. Or do they? Three friends let their imagination run free. With interesting results.
